name: SlenderMeg
description:
Warning: this game contains blood, frightening imagery and an intense situation (It's a horror game what did expect?)

Run through the water, fleeing from the leviathan that hunts you down while trying to find evidence for it's very existence. They didn't believe you and now, you'll prove them  wrong...

I made this game to teach myself Unity, enjoy this absolute disaster of a game.

By the way you walk over evidence to collect it

Chase music can be found here https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
